Class MultiSig

  • public class MultiSig
extends Object
    Redeem script to make a Multisig transaction Generate redeem scipt and extract Bitcoin address from redeem scipt

      static String createRedeemScript(int threshold, List<byte[]> pubkeys)
      create Redeem script from given public keys n of m Multisig redeem script means n keys are required to redeem the transaction which is consist of m public keys

    • Method Detail

      • createRedeemScript

        public static String createRedeemScript(int threshold,
                                        List<byte[]> pubkeys)
        create Redeem script from given public keys n of m Multisig redeem script means n keys are required to redeem the transaction which is consist of m public keys
        Parameters:
        threshold - threshold is a number of private keys which are required to redeem the transaction
        pubkeys - list of public keys to make a redeem script
        Returns:
        Hex encoded redeem scipt

      • createAddressFromRedeemScript

        public static String createAddressFromRedeemScript(org.bitcoinj.script.Script redeemScript,
                                                   boolean isMainNet)
        extract Bitcoin address from redeem script(String object)
        Parameters:
        redeemScript - given redeem script which is generated by createRedeemScipt
        isMainNet - true is Mainnet, false is Testnet
        Returns:
        Bitcoin address

      • createAddressFromRedeemScript

        public static String createAddressFromRedeemScript(String redeemScript,
                                                   boolean isMainNet)
                                            throws MalformedInputException
        extract Bitcoin address from redeem script(Script object)
        Parameters:
        redeemScript - given redeem script which is generated by createRedeemScipt
        isMainNet - true is Mainnet, false is Testnet
        Returns:
        Bitcoin address
        Throws:
        MalformedInputException
